verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Verse: 1
Father of kindness
you have poured out grace
you brought me out of darkness
you have filled me with peace
Giver of mercy
your my help in time of need
Lord I can't help but sing

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Faithful, you are
Faithful, forever, you will be
Faithful, you are
All your promises are "yes" and "amen"
All your promises are "yes" and "amen"

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Verse: 2
Beautiful saviour
you have brought me here
you pulled me from the ashes
you have broken every curse
Blessed redeemer
you have set this captive free
Lord I can't help but sing

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Faithful, you are
Faithful, forever, you will be
Faithful, you are
All your promises are "yes" and "amen"
All your promises are "yes" and "amen"

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
I will rest
in your promises
my confidence
is your faithfulness
